actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide for a review of a decision concerning a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant in Washtenaw County, Michigan.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to direct the Assistant Administrator for Water to grant the petition submitted on May 31, 1996, on behalf of Washtenaw County, Michigan, for review of a Regional Administrator's decision involving a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant.

titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide for a review of a decision concerning a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant in Washtenaw County, Michigan.
